charges.charge_description: 18:2252A.F  ACTIVITIES RE MATERIAL CONSTITUTING/CONTAINING CHILD PORNO  On or about 9/29/09 in Tazewell County, in CDIL, dft by means of a computer knowingly received child pornography as defined by Title 18, USC ยง 2256(8), to wit, a digital video. In violation of Title 18 USC ยง2252A(a)(2)(A) and (b)(1)

18:2252A.F  ACTIVITIES RE MATERIAL CONSTITUTING/CONTAINING CHILD PORNO  On or about 9/29/09 in Tazewell County in the CDIL, Dft by means of a computer and by using a means of interstate commerce, being the internet, knowingly received child pornography to wit; a digital video depicting a naked two or three year old female being subjected to anal-genital intercourse by an adult man, in violation of 18 USC 2252A(a)(2)(A) and 2252A(b)(1).(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft committed to the BOP for 180 months. Dft placed on Supervised Release for a period of Life. No fine imposed. Dft ordered to pay $100.00 Special Assessment immediately.

charges.charge_description: 18:2252.F SEXUAL EXPLOITATION OF MINORS On or about 9/29/09, in Tazewell County, within the CDIL, Dft by means of a computer and by using means of interstate commerce, being the internet, knowingly received child pornography to wit: a digital video depicting a naked child in violation of Title 18 USC Sections 2252A(a)(2)(A) and 2252A(b)(1)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: dismissed on motion of the Govt

charges.charge_description: 18:252A.F  ACTIVITIES RE MATERIAL CONSTITUTING/CONTAINING CHILD PORNO  On or about 9/09 in Tazewell County in the CDIL, Dft did knowingly possess material, being a USB digital storage device, that contained images of child pornography to wit; digital videos of minor females being subjected to anal-genital sexual intercourse and genital-genital sexual intercourse by adult males, said images are in addition to the video alleged in Count 1 herein, and said images alleged in this count were produced using materials that had been transported in interstate commerce, being a computer hard drive and a USB digital storage device. In violation of 18 USC 2252A(a)(5)(B) and 2252A(b)(1).(2s)

charges.charge_disposition: dismissed on motion of the Govt
